attributes.action: The BBC is a failed institution and must be fundamentally reset or dissolved.
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC is insidiously poisoning our society and culture and with the payment of the licence fee, we are paying for the same. The BBC shapes our society towards socialism. Here is the best document ever written on socialism, which in only 12 paragraphs, masterfully summarises this hideous political doctrine of slavery.

http://w2.vatican.va/content/leo-xiii/en/encyclicals/documents/hf_l-xiii_enc_28121878_quod-apostolici-muneris.html
attributes.background: The BBC is now an enemy of British society. It is idolatrous of state power (socialist) in displacement of personal liberty. It subverts traditional morality and instead of cultivating civilisation as founded on truth, reason and virtue, it functions in direction to what is false and base.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the BBC, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234797
